TopicTitle: Black screen then KSP window goes black. Happens in VAB or SPH

Articles.Content:
Okay so when I am In the VAB or SPH I get this occasional bug that makes me have to restart the game Its very annoying. So what happens Is the display goes black for 1 or 2 seconds then the KSP window Is black then a message pops up saying (NVIDIA Display driver has stopped working and has recovered) Might be a problem with my machine but it only happens when In the VAB. also I am using KSP 32 bit.

PC Specs Some of them.

OS Windows 7 64 bit

CPU Intel core duo T9600

GPU NVIDIA quadro FX 770M
Any luck finding a fix? I am also having the same NVIDIA driver error.
You usually only get that message if you alt+tab out of KSP from fullscreen, especially if you do that while KSP loads, so try alt+enter to change to windowed first.
